abstract.p: Doral Golf Resort in Miami offers golfer aerobics classes

block.p: It may be impossible to get some golfers' swings into shape, but the Doral Golf Resort and Spa in Miami at least tries to get players in better condition. It offers a 40-minute golfer aerobics class, using a short, weighted golf club, set to music. It is held 4 p.m. Wednesdays at the Jim McLean Golf School, and costs $10. Call (305) 592-2000.

Offers to surf the Web for pay are ubiquitous. Now comes a chance to earn travel and other rewards for reading e-mail. A Dallas company, e-Rewards, is inviting people to receive and respond to e-mail promotions from companies like Delta and United Airlines, Hertz and Vail Resorts, who choose the participants. Depending on how many messages are received and answered, participants earn certificates worth $25 to $100 for airline tickets, car rentals, lift tickets and various products. Go to www.erewards .com to apply.
